scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Jess
scrape.text: The story meandered a lot. And honestly, these people were all jerks and had almost no redeeming qualities to make you empathize or root for them. (view spoiler)[ And I'm rolling my eyes so hard at the idea that Paul and Michel had some genetic disorder that without medication caused them to be violent, like some Incredible Hulk syndrome. And a genetic disorder SO BAD apparently that if parents found out about it in utero that they would almost certainly terminate the pregnancy. Paul was not likable, it was weird. (hide spoiler)]
